molten_copper.title: Molten Copper
molten_copper.description: Dark mode 2.5D floor plan with ember gradient walls and white wireframe furniture.
molten_copper.materiality: Matte Gradient Walls on Dark Floor
molten_copper.generated_prompt: CRITICAL VIEWPOINT RULE: ABSOLUTELY STRICT TOP-DOWN ORTHOGRAPHIC VIEW ONLY. Camera angle MUST be exactly 90 degrees straight down, like looking at a blueprint on a table. FORBIDDEN: NO camera tilt, NO isometric angle, NO 3D rotation, NO perspective distortion, NO angled view, NO oblique projection. The floor plan must appear completely flat as if viewed from directly above. Transform into stylized 2.5D floor plan. WALLS: Extruded 3D walls with SMOOTH FLAT MATTE SOLID colors - absolutely NO texture, NO noise, NO metallic effect, NO roughness. Wall TOP SURFACES: vibrant saturated BRIGHT ORANGE (#FF5722). Wall VERTICAL SIDES: solid deep CRIMSON RED (#C62828). Colors must be clean, flat, smooth like painted plastic or vector graphics. FLOOR: Uniform smooth matte dark charcoal (#1A1A1A), no texture. TEXT & FURNITURE: Pure white 2D wireframe line drawings only. SHADOWS: Soft drop shadows toward bottom-right. NO metallic textures, NO copper effect, NO noise - clean smooth matte colors only. REMINDER: Camera MUST remain perfectly vertical - zero tilt, zero rotation, pure top-down view like a satellite photo.

burgundy_velvet.title: Burgundy Velvet
burgundy_velvet.description: High-contrast burgundy theme with a deep red gradient background, crisp white walls, and muted reddish-brown furniture.
burgundy_velvet.generated_prompt: Transform into a high-contrast architectural presentation layout. Background: A deep, rich gradient fading from Muted Burgundy (#5b2223) to Dark Wine (#2b1011). Walls: Clean, solid, bright Off-White (#fffefe) extruded walls that pop against the dark background. Furniture: Stylized 2D wireframe lines in Muted Reddish-Brown (#6e3e3c). Text/Labels: Crisp Off-White (#fffefa). Shadows: Soft ambient occlusion drop shadows to lift the white walls off the red floor. Aesthetic: Modern, sleek, professional dark mode.

crimson_white_structure.title: Crimson Structure
crimson_white_structure.description: Dramatic high-contrast 2.5D plan. Deep textured burgundy background with pure white extruded wall tops and wireframe details, casting deep shadows.
crimson_white_structure.materiality: Textured Burgundy Background + Pure White Matte Extrusions
crimson_white_structure.generated_prompt: A high-contrast 2.5D physical architectural model visualization. BACKGROUND & UNIFORM FLOOR: A rich, deep, textured burgundy wine color (#330F0F) across the entire canvas, resembling heavy cardstock or velvet paper. THE WALLS: Extruded 3D walls where the TOP HORIZONTAL SURFACE is pure, brilliant matte White (#FFFFFF). The VERTICAL SIDES of the extrusion are the same deep burgundy color as the background, making the white tops appear to rise sharply out of the dark base. DETAILS: All furniture, trees, landscaping, fixtures, and dimension text are rendered as fine, crisp pure White (#FFFFFF) wireframe lines. LIGHTING & SHADOWS: Strong, dramatic directional lighting from the top-left. This casts deep, soft, realistic dark shadows from the white wall tops onto the burgundy background, creating significant physical depth and a 'pop-up book' effect.

red_velvet_physical.title: Red Velvet
red_velvet_physical.description: Dramatic monochromatic physical model with deep burgundy background, stark white foam-core walls, and salmon pink wireframe details.
red_velvet_physical.generated_prompt: You are an Expert Architectural Technical Artist specializing in 2.5D presentation styles and physical model simulations. Generate an architectural visualization with the 'Red Velvet Physical Model' style. BACKGROUND: Deep Textured Burgundy (#350E0F) with subtle matte paper grain texture across entire canvas. WALLS: Extruded Stark White (#FFFFFF) 'foam-core' style blocks with distinct 2.5D height - the walls must appear as physical white foam board rising from the dark surface. LIGHTING & SHADOWS: Directional top-left lighting creating deep, soft-edged drop shadows (#150000) cast to the bottom-right, emphasizing physical depth and pop-up book effect. FURNITURE & LINEWORK: Delicate, crisp Salmon Pink (#E08585) wireframes for all furniture, fixtures, and text - appearing as laser-etched details on the dark surface. VEGETATION: Stylized translucent wireframe trees in matching light red/salmon tones. AESTHETIC: Dramatic, monochromatic, high-contrast architectural presentation board with a premium physical model feel. Maintain strict top-down orthographic view. Do not alter structural layout - only apply aesthetic rendering.

maroon_cardstock.title: Deep Maroon
maroon_cardstock.description: Minimalist moody presentation board with matte burgundy background, floating white walls with ambient occlusion, and muted rose wireframes.
maroon_cardstock.materiality: Matte Paper Grain + Floating White Block-outs
maroon_cardstock.generated_prompt: Deep Maroon Architectural Cardstock Style. STRICT RULES: Do not deviate from specified Hex codes. Ensure 'floating' depth effect via shadow manipulation. Maintain wireframe purity for non-structural elements. BACKGROUND: Uniform Matte Burgundy (#2F0A0D) with subtle paper grain texture across entire canvas. WALLS: Solid Stark White (#FFFFFF) block-out extrusions with deep, soft Ambient Occlusion shadows from Top-Left Light Source creating a 'floating' layered effect - walls appear to hover above the surface. FURNITURE, CARS & VEGETATION: Ultra-fine, single-weight Wireframe lines in Muted Rose (#CFA4A4) . TEXT: Crisp White (#FFFFFF) Sans-Serif labels, minimal and clean. STYLE: Minimalist, moody, high-contrast premium presentation board aesthetic. Top-down orthographic view only.

physical_model_blueprint.title: Oak Blueprint
physical_model_blueprint.description: Physical Model Blueprint Hybrid with light oak walls, beige wireframes, and dark slate navy background.
physical_model_blueprint.viewpoint: Top-down Orthographic (Plan View). No perspective distortion.
physical_model_blueprint.lighting_style: Global Illumination with directional Key Light from Top-Left, casting soft diffuse shadows to Bottom-Right. Strong Ambient Occlusion where walls meet floor.
physical_model_blueprint.materiality: Light wood or cardboard walls (matte finish). Furniture lines resemble metallic ink or beige pencil.
physical_model_blueprint.generated_prompt: You are an Architectural Technical Artist & Texture Synthesis Specialist. Core Behaviors: Expertise in High-fidelity Style Transfer for architectural deliverables. Goal: Apply the aesthetic of a Reference Visual DNA to a Target Layout without altering the target's geometry. LOCK GEOMETRY: Treat the target image as a HARD STRUCTURAL CONSTRAINT. Do not move walls, change aspect ratios, or rearrange furniture. Apply the following Visual DNA to the target floorplan: Physical Model Blueprint Hybrid. Background: Uniform Matte Dark Slate Navy (#252935) with flat cardstock texture. Walls: Extruded 3D Light Oak (#C8A684) with visible height and soft directional drop shadows (top-left light source). Lines, Furniture & Fixtures: Fine Beige Wireframe (#DBCAB0) 2D vector strokesâ€”strictly non-extruded. Text: Clean Sans-Serif White (#FFFFFF) in all caps. Lighting: Soft global illumination with deep ambient occlusion at wall bases. Style: High-fidelity minimalist architectural mockup combining physical block walls with digital schematic details. Top-down orthographic view only.

slate_maize.title: Slate Maize
slate_maize.description: High-contrast dark-mode 2.5D plan with slate-teal background and pale maize-yellow wall tops.
slate_maize.viewpoint: Orthographic Top-Down (2D Plan) with 2.5D extrusion elements.
slate_maize.lighting_style: Simulated soft global illumination or ambient occlusion to ground the walls. No harsh directional hard shadows.
slate_maize.materiality: Matte surfaces. High contrast between the 'Pop' color of the wall tops and the dark base.
slate_maize.generated_prompt: Modern 2.5D Architectural Plan. Background: Matte Dark Slate-Teal (#2F3E3F) with subtle vignette. Walls: Extruded Pale Maize-Yellow (#E3DC95) tops with deep slate sides and soft drop shadows. Floors: Deep Charcoal (#1B1B1B) matte finish. Furniture: Minimalist White (#FFFFFF) wireframes and semi-transparent fills. Typography: Clean White (#FFFFFF) Sans-Serif labels. Lighting: Soft top-down directional with ambient occlusion. Style: High-contrast, clean, dark-mode visualization.

slate_white.title: Slate White
slate_white.description: Moody dark-mode visualization with deep slate navy background, floating white walls, and ghost-white wireframes.
slate_white.viewpoint: Strictly Orthographic Top-Down. No perspective convergence on the layout, but shadows imply depth.
slate_white.lighting_style: Simulated Global Illumination with a strong directional key light from the Top-Left. Shadows fall softly to the Bottom-Right, creating the illusion of the walls hovering over the canvas.
slate_white.materiality: Matte white structural blocks with ghost-white wireframe details.
slate_white.generated_prompt: Moody 3D Architectural Floor Plan. Background: Deep Gradient Slate Navy (#1B2A38) fading to Black (#0A0E12) vignette. crimson_maquette.title: Crimson Maquette
crimson_maquette.description: High-impact monochromatic physical model aesthetic with deep crimson cardstock background and cool white architectural blocks.
crimson_maquette.lighting_style: Simulated soft global illumination. Walls cast realistic, soft-edged shadows onto the floor, creating depth. No specular highlights (matte).
crimson_maquette.materiality: Matte finish throughout. Floor looks like heavy cardstock; walls look like architectural modeling board.
crimson_maquette.generated_prompt: High-Impact Monochromatic Architectural Maquette. Background: Deep Matte Crimson (#802020) with subtle fine-grain paper texture. Walls: Extruded 3D Cool White (#EEEEEE) structural blocks with distinct height. Furniture, Fixtures & Text: Ultra-thin, crisp Pure White (#FFFFFF) 2D CAD wireframe drafting lines projected flat onto the floor. slate_marigold.title: Slate Marigold
slate_marigold.description: Dark-mode technical noir with deep slate teal background and vibrant marigold walls in a paper cut-out aesthetic.
slate_marigold.lighting_style: Global Illumination with Ambient Occlusion. Shadows are soft and diffused, suggesting a studio light setup from the top-left.
slate_marigold.materiality: Matte surfaces with paper cut-out wall aesthetic.

night_marigold.title: Night Marigold
night_marigold.description: Minimalist night-mode aesthetic with deep slate teal background, vibrant marigold walls, and ice white wireframes.
night_marigold.lighting_style: Soft global illumination with distinct Ambient Occlusion (AO) grounding the raised walls. Shadows cast to the bottom-right.
night_marigold.materiality: Walls appear as solid matte plastic/clay. Furniture is rendered as delicate 2D CAD wireframes (schematic style). Vegetation is stylized wireframe mesh.
night_marigold.generated_prompt: Modern Dark-Mode Architectural Plan. Background: Smooth Deep Slate Teal (#1B262C) with soft vignette. petrol_white.title: Petrol White
petrol_white.description: Atmospheric hybrid aesthetic combining physical foam-core model walls with digital blueprint wireframes on deep petrol blue background.
petrol_white.viewpoint: Top-down Orthographic with slight depth perception (3D extrusion visible).
petrol_white.lighting_style: Strong Directional Light (Sun) coming from Top-Left. Evidenced by shadows cast to the Bottom-Right. Features soft Ambient Occlusion at wall bases.
petrol_white.materiality: Physical Model aesthetic for walls (matte, solid, light-catching). Blueprint aesthetic for interior details (thin vector lines, transparent/wireframe).
petrol_white.generated_prompt: Atmospheric 3D Architectural Model Presentation. Background: Deep Gradient Petrol Blue (#1A2B3C to #0D141A) with smooth vignette. Walls: Extruded Matte White (#FFFFFF) structural blocks with high physical depth. Furniture & Fixtures: Fine Ghost-White (#E0E6EB) wireframe schematic lines overlaying the floor. Vegetation: Stylized white sketch-line trees. Lighting: Dramatic top-left directional light casting soft, elongated deep shadows (#05080C). Style: Hybrid physical foam-core model meets digital blueprint, high contrast, moody, elegant.

emerald_white.title: Emerald White
emerald_white.description: Elegant monochromatic hybrid aesthetic with deep emerald teal background, white structural walls, and white gel pen sketch details.
emerald_white.lighting_style: Soft directional light from the top-left, generating realistic ambient occlusion and diffusion shadows towards the bottom-right.
emerald_white.materiality: Matte finish on walls. Furniture, plants, and text are depicted as 'White Gel Pen' or 'White Pencil' sketches directly on the teal surface, creating a blueprint/sketch aesthetic.
emerald_white.generated_prompt: Subject: Architectural Physical Model Simulation. Background: Deep Emerald Teal (#10403B) with matte paper texture and vignette. Walls: Extruded Minimalist White (#F5F5F5) with soft drop shadows (#08201D). Furniture & Vegetation: Fine White Wireframe (#FFFFFF) sketches, resembling white ink on dark paper. Lighting: Soft directional top-left source. Style: Elegant, monochromatic, hybrid 3D-structural/2D-sketch aesthetic.

physical_architectural_model.title: Physical Model (Slate)
physical_architectural_model.description: Museum-quality physical model aesthetic with matte dark slate grey background, bone white floors, and basswood/oak wall caps.
physical_architectural_model.viewpoint: ** Top-down 3D Orthographic (Plan View). Not a flat drawing; walls have height.
physical_architectural_model.lighting_style: ** Heavily relies on Ambient Occlusion (AO). No hard sunlight direction; soft, diffuse shadows ground the furniture to the floor.
physical_architectural_model.materiality: ** 'Clay' render style for furniture (white, featureless blocks). 'Basswood' or 'Birch Plywood' aesthetic for wall caps. Floors are a uniform matte cream.
physical_architectural_model.generated_prompt: Physical Architectural Model Aesthetic. Background: Matte Dark Slate Grey (#3E444A) with uniform coverage. Floors: Smooth Matte Bone White (#F0ECE6) void of grain. Walls: Extruded 3D geometry topped with Light Basswood/Oak Veneer (#C5A577). Furniture: Minimalist 'White Clay' blocks (#FFFFFF) with schematic vector line detailing. Lighting: Soft Global Illumination with deep, diffuse Ambient Occlusion shadows (#1A1A1A). Text: Crisp Technical Sans-Serif Black (#000000). Style: Clean, isometric-like orthographic projection, museum-quality physical model look.
